full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Important Background Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4148078904-Doc4153447404
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Publication Date**: August 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 15, 2023, 14:00 EDT

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Service
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: Various Free Trade Agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Contract Description

The government invites bids for the provision of Informatics professional services to support the Pay Administration Branch (PAB) of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC). This procurement requires the services of Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply.

**Eligibility Requirements**

To be eligible to compete, bidders must:

* Be a registered supply arrangement holder for TBIPS Tier 2 services
* Provide all required resource categories identified in the solicitation
* Operate in the National Capital Region under the EN578-170432 series of SAs

### Assessment Criteria

The selection committee will evaluate bids based on the following criteria:

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Contact Information

*Sylvie Morin (SPAC/PSPC)*  
*Director, Cost and Pay Structure*  
Email: [sylvie.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sylvie.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)  
Note: Only bids submitted electronically through the specified website will be considered.

### Important Dates

* **Tender Closing Date**: September 15, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* **Security Requirement**: Identified in the solicitation.

### Inspection and Obtaining Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents can be downloaded from the specified website.  
All inquiries regarding this solicitation should be directed to the contact person above.  

End of Announcement  
### Related Tags

* Office of Small and Medium Enterprises (OSME)
* Office of the Chief Information Officer (OCIO)  
* Small and Medium Enterprise (SME) Toolkit  
* Refugee Sponsorship Support Program  
* RCMP Contracting Board (RCMB)  
* Government of Canada Tender Opportunities  
* Procurement Level  
* Post-Tender Contract Tests Proposal
